xmlText.p: TORONTO BLUE JAYS — Agreed to terms with RHP Jake Petricka on a minor league contract.<
PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES — Agreed to terms with 2B Ryan Flaherty and OF Collin Cowgill on minor league contracts.
PITTSBURGH PIRATES — Agreed to terms with OF Daniel Nava on a minor league contract.<
SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS — Signed LHP Derek Holland to a minor league contract.

NBA — Announced Memphis Grizzlies coach J.B. Bickerstaff has been fined $25,000 for directing inappropriate comments toward a game official and failing to leave the court in a timely manner following his ejection.
ATLANTA HAWKS — Waived G/F Marco Belinelli.
CHICAGO BULLS — Waived G/F Tony Allen.<
NEW YORK LIBERTY — Re-signed G Bria Hartley and C Kia Vaughn.<
DETROIT LIONS — Signed general manager Bob Quinn to a contract extension. Named Bo Davis defensive line coach.
MINNESOTA VIKINGS — Named John DeFilippo offensive coordinator.<
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Signed LB J.C.Sherritt to a contract extension through the 2019 season.
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Agreed to terms with WR Adarius Bowman on a one-year contract.<
ANAHEIM DUCKS — Reassigned G Reto Berra and LW Nic Kerdiles to San Diego (AHL).
CALGARY FLAMES — Assigned G Mason McDonald from Stockton (AHL) to Kansas City (ECHL) and G Tyler Parsons from Kansas City to Stockton.
CAROLINA HURRICANES — Assigned Fs Marcus Kruger and Josh Jooris to Charlotte (AHL).
CHICAGO BLACKHAWKS — Placed D Jan Rutta on injured reserve, retroactive to Tuesday. Recalled D Carl Dahlstrom from Rockford (AHL).
MINNESOTA WILD — Recalled Fs Pavel Jenys and Chase Lang from Rapid City (ECHL) to Iowa (AHL).

NEW YORK RANGERS — Traded F Joe Whitney and RW Adam Chapie to Washington for F John Albert and D Hubert Labrie. Assigned D Brendan Smith to Hartford (AHL). Recalled D John Gilmour from Hartford. Reassigned D Sergey Zborovskiy from Greenville (ECHL) to Hartford.
ST. LOUIS BLUES — Recalled D Chris Butler from San Antonio (AHL).<
CLEVELAND MONSTERS — Returned RW Sam Kurker on loan to Manchester (ECHL).
GRAND RAPIDS GRIFFINS — Assigned D Kevin Tansey to Toledo (ECHL).
LEHIGH VALLEY PHANTOMS — Recalled D James De Haas from Reading (ECHL).
ROCKFORD ICEHOGS — Assigned G Matt Tomkins to Indy (ECHL).
SYRACUSE CRUNCH — Assigned F Shane Conacher to Adirondack (ECHL).
TORONTO MARLIES — Assigned D Jeff King to Brampton (ECHL).
TUCSON ROADRUNNERS — Assigned D Ryan Culkin to Fort Wayne (ECHL).
ECHL — Suspended D Kevin Gibson one game.
ADIRONDACK THUNDER — Loaned D Desmond Bergin to Hartford (AHL).
FLORIDA EVERBLADES — Loaned F Dave Dziurzynski to Utica (AHL).
GREENVILLE SWAMP RABBITS — Claimed G Greg Dodds off waivers from Indy.
KALAMAZOO WINGS — Loaned F Justin Taylor to Utica (AHL).
TULSA OILERS — Added G Jordan Neamonitis as emergency backup.<
PORTLAND TIMBERS — Acquired F Samuel Armenteros on loan from Benevento Calcio (Serie A-Italy).<
NCAA — Granted a sixth season of eligibility to Iowa State QB Kyle Kempt.
ILLINOIS — Named Austin Clark defensive line coach.
NORTHWESTERN — Named Jeff Genyk special teams coordinator.
